page.title: 20THE HARBOUR, EMSWORTH
page.content:
The harbour is not very busy.It has quite a lot of boats in the harbour. There is a Yacht Club next to the Slipper Mill which is now the Yacht Clubhouse.Net to the Slipper Mill there is the mill pond. The water goes through the inlet and stays until the next tide.Next to the Slipper Mill there is a Boat Shop which sells dinghies and motors as well as many other things for sailing. There is a road leading to the centre of Emsworth.There is also a Restaurant net to the Boat Shop.
{Information compiled by the pupils {of:- Warblington Comprehensive School; Emsworth St.James' Middle School; Emsworth Middle School. {With the help of:-}Steve Armstrong, Bob Dickie and Brian Vince.
